title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, November 7, 2019
description: It’s the birthday of Marie Skłodowska Curie (1867) who is the only person to win a Nobel Prize in two different scientific fields, Physics and Chemistry.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Marie Skłodowska Curie (1867) who is the only person to win a Nobel Prize in two different scientific fields, Physics and Chemistry.
